keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
Oppose the Local Development Framework plan imposing thousands of new houses because of wrong population growth assumptions.
Abolish the un-elected Natural England quango and its policy of managed erosion of our coasts.

mentions.candidate: For Britain to regain its self-respect and control over its own destiny.

issues.brexitEurope: Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
issues.education: Teach all our children equally, free from the Roman period to the present day, without apologising for the British Empire.
issues.environment: Abolish the un-elected Natural England quango and its policy of managed erosion of our coasts.

housing.content: Oppose the Local Development Framework plan imposing thousands of new houses because of wrong population growth assumptions.

leaflet.personalStatement: For Britain to regain its self-respect and control over its own destiny...
